argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sspm.y | |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) |
| 2 |  | sspm.m | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | sspm.l | |- L = ( -v ` W ) |
| 4 |  | sspm.h | |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_sspmval | |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( x e. Y /\ y e. Y ) ) -> ( x L y ) = ( x M y ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_nvmf | |- ( W e. NrmCVec -> L : ( Y X. Y ) --> Y ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( BaseSet ` U ) = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 8 | 7, 2 | #P_nvmf | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> M : ( ( BaseSet ` U ) X. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) --> ( BaseSet ` U ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 4, 5, 6, 8 | #P_sspmlem | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> L = ( M |` ( Y X. Y ) ) ) |
